secret_rule: The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is a single-word noun that starts with the letter 'U'.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Utensils" and "Umbrella".
Based on the examples "Utensils" and "Umbrella," it seems the rule pertains to items that start with the letter "U." My guess for the secret rule is that the items must begin with the letter "U."
Correct! The rule is The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is a single-word noun that starts with the letter 'U'.
